rules_text:
Each opponent mills cards until that player has milled a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card.
Bloodborn 5–{U}{U} [i]({U}{U}: Exile this from your graveyard with five gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
